Property Location
Located in Port Fairy, Central Motel Port Fairy is close to Griffiths Island Lighthouse and Port Fairy Golf Club. This motel is within the region of The Craggs and Tower Hill Wildlife Reserve.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 19 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a picnic area.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
